NAME: removemoney
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to remove change from a user.
OPTION_USER_DESCRIPTION: The user you want to remove money from.
OPTION_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: The amount you want to remove.
IS_BOT: Cannot remove currency from a bot.
TITLE: Removed money on {{username}}'s wallet.
RESULT: You just removed {{amount}}xin from the {{user}}'s wallet.
